com.fdmgroup.heatseeker.controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fdmgroup.heatseeker.controller.LoginController

  • @Controller
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles user login. Gets the DAO and password encoder from the ApplicationContext. Passwords are encrypted using Spring Security.
    Author:
    ming.kong

    • Method Detail

      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="/Login",
                method=POST,
                params="login")
public java.lang.String login(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Creates a user using the login parameters and attempts to read the corresponding user from the database and compare passwords. Catches NoResultException is there is no corresponding user in the database and sets the appropriate error message. Sets the appropriate error message if password is invalid and returns back to index.
        Parameters:
        request - Used to get login parameters and pass in login error messages
        session - Used to set a user attribute object if the login is successful
        Returns:
        String to correct .jsp page

      • register

        @RequestMapping(value="/Login",
                method=POST,
                params="registerBasicUser")
public java.lang.String register(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Test function used to add basic users to the database with encrypted password. Registration function will no be available at release.
        Parameters:
        request - Used to create user to register to database
        Returns:
        to logged-in index page

      • registerDeptAdmin

        @RequestMapping(value="/Login",
                method=POST,
                params="registerDeptAdmin")
public java.lang.String registerDeptAdmin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                               throws DepartmentDoesNotExistException
        Test function used to add departmentAdmin users to the database with encrypted password. Registration function will no be available at release.
        Parameters:
        request - Used to create user to register to database
        Returns:
        to logged-in index page
        Throws:
        DepartmentDoesNotExistException
